trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Port St Joe
There were no other sightings in Port St Joe on or around September 28th 2008
Summary: silver / white cigar-shaped craft cloud height
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were docked in the Gulf Canal one-half mile NE of Tapper Bridge enjoying the scenery, brilliant blue skies with a few wispy high (cirrus) clouds at approximately 3:30 pm EDT. At approximately 3:40 EDT, I witnessed an aerial object at cloud height approach my line of sight from the SE heading NW. The object appeared to be a silvery-white color. The object was rather unusual because no wings could be detected, nor was there any sound associated. The object resembled a blimp in shape, cigar-shaped more or less and was moving at a steady speed. The object disappeared into one of the thicker cirrus clouds and did not reappear. Sighting lasted approximately 70 seconds.
